thread.title: New Yorkers Enjoy Storm With Snowball Fight
thread.title_full: New Yorkers Enjoy Storm With Snowball Fight [Video]

author: Storyful
title: New Yorkers Enjoy Storm With Snowball Fight
text:
New Yorkers Enjoy Storm With Snowball Fight Storyful â€¢ 9 February 2017 New Yorkers had some fun with a snowball fight as a monster snowstorm blanketed the region on Thursday, February 9. About a foot of snow was predicted to fall throughout the region with winds that could create blowing and drifting snow.
Officials asked people to stay off the roads so plows could clear them. Car accidents were reported throughout the region, and flights were canceled at area airports.
The uploader of this video reported about 200 people were at the snowball fight at Madison Square Park. Credit: Instagram/Elizabeth Rutledge via Storyful
